name: Scratch Building!
description:
Hey thanks for clicking on my game, if you want to install this game, all you godda do is download the file, then extract it, then go through all the folders, then run the EXE and you should be able to play.  if you wanna get out of full screen, press ESC because the game auto Fullscreen's.

Use the mouse to click on things

press esc to get out of Fullscreen

its... pretty easy lol

This game is a scratch game witch you can find Here and I decided to port it because its a cool game, and I recommend playing the original one, but my port makes the game run better and stuff, so I recommend playing my port. but stull support the original creators
